title: Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, 61 Keys Compact Mechanical Keyboard w/White and Grey Color Keycaps, Linear Red Switch, Pro Driver/Software Supported
descriptions: Introducing the Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard! This compact mechanical keyboard is perfect for FPS gamers who demand high performance and style. With 61 keys and a sleek white and grey color scheme, the Redragon K617 Fizz offers a seamless gaming experience. The linear red switch provides a quiet, responsive feel, and with a lifespan of 50 million keypresses, this keyboard is built to last. The customizable RGB lighting with 20 presets allows you to create the perfect gaming atmosphere. Pro driver/software support gives you the power to personalize your keyboard to your specific needs, including design modes, effects, macros, keybindings, and shortcuts. With its compact design and optimized mouse space, the Redragon K617 Fizz is the perfect addition to any gaming setup. Don't miss out on the ultimate gaming keyboard - get your Redragon K617 Fizz today!
